org.wiyn.etc.configuration
Class LunarProperties

java.lang.Object
  org.wiyn.etc.configuration.GenericProperties
      org.wiyn.etc.configuration.LunarProperties
All Implemented Interfaces:
AllowingPropertyChanges, PiptData, PiptSafelyAccessible
public class LunarProperties
extends GenericProperties
implements PiptData

This class provides the lunar properties of some target. These comprise the zenith distance of the moon, the lunar phase and the lunar elongation.

Constructor Summary

Constructor Detail

LunarProperties

public LunarProperties(double moonZenithDistance,
                       double lunarPhase,
                       double lunarElongation)
Sets the lunar properties to the given values.

Parameters:
moonZenithDistance - the zenith distance of the moon
lunarPhase - the phase of the moon (in degrees from 0 to 180; 0 means full moon)
lunarElongation - the lunar elongation (in degrees)
Method Detail

setMoonZenithDistance

public void setMoonZenithDistance(double moonZenithDistance)
Sets the zenith distance of the moon to the given value.

Parameters:
moonZenithDistance - the zenith distance of the moon (in degrees)

safeSetMoonZenithDistance

public void safeSetMoonZenithDistance(double moonZenithDistance)
Checks whether the given value for the zenith distance of the moon lies in the range from 0 to 180 degrees and, if so, assigns it to the zenith distance of the moon, using the setZenithDistance() method.

Parameters:
moonZenithDistance - the zenith distance of the moon (in degrees)
Throws:
InvalidValueException - if the given zenith distance doesn't lie in the interval from 0 to 180 degrees
